author: sky.cactus
content: What are the current EVM-384 EIP and BLS Precompile EIP numbers?

author: saitima2051
content: EIP-2537 for BLS precompile. afaik evm384 has no eip yet, it may be published soon.

author: sky.cactus
content: Perhaps we should break this EIP up into smaller EIPs so we can get some actually integrated.  From the above, it sounds like ETH2 will need `BLS12_PAIRING`, `BLS12_MAP_FP_TO_G1`, `BLS12_MAP_FP2_TO_G2`.
